name: Hamster Clicker made by Artixeo and ChatGPT
name_original: Hamster Clicker made by Artixeo and ChatGPT
description:
This game is made by Artixeo and ChatGPT.

The code came only from ChatGPT.

To run the game you have to:

1. Download "server.py"

2. Install python

3. Install libs with "pip install flask flask_cors"

4. Run "server.py"

5. Run the game in your browser on ITCH.IO

PS You need to do this because the game is made for multiple players and it's not working without a server.
